sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.description: Puts 2d4 HD of creatures to sleep. Affects lowest HD creatures first.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: Fires 1 missile (+1 per 2 levels after 1st). Each missile does 1d4+1 damage. Never misses.

protection_from_evil.name: Protection from Evil
protection_from_evil.description: Grants +2 to AC and saves against evil creatures. Prevents possession.

detect_magic.name: Detect Magic
detect_magic.description: Detects magical auras on objects and creatures.

burning_hands.name: Burning Hands
burning_hands.description: A cone of flame erupts from the caster's hands, dealing 1d3+1 damage per level of the caster.

charm_person.name: Charm Person
charm_person.description: Makes one person regard the caster as a trusted friend. Only works on humanoids.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Creates an invisible barrier that grants AC 2 vs missiles, AC 4 vs other attacks.

light.name: Light
light.description: Creates a bright light like a torch. Can be cast on objects.

read_magic.name: Read Magic
read_magic.description: Allows caster to read magical writings and scrolls.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Allies gain +1 to attack rolls and morale saves.

command.name: Command
command.description: Give a one-word command that the target must obey (flee, halt, drop, etc).

detect_evil.name: Detect Evil
detect_evil.description: Detects evil intentions and evil creatures.

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: Target becomes invisible until they attack. Grants +4 to AC and surprise.

web.name: Web
web.description: Creates sticky webs that trap creatures. STR check to break free.

mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
mirror_image.description: Creates 1d4+1 illusory duplicates that confuse attackers.

knock.name: Knock
knock.description: Opens locked, barred, or wizard-locked doors.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: Target levitates up or down at 20 feet per round.

silence_15_radius.name: Silence 15' Radius
silence_15_radius.description: No sound can be made in the area. Prevents spellcasting.

spiritual_hammer.name: Spiritual Hammer
spiritual_hammer.description: Creates a magical hammer that attacks enemies, dealing 1d4+1 damage.

find_traps.name: Find Traps
find_traps.description: Reveals the presence of traps within range.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Explodes for 1d6 damage per caster level (max 10d6). Save for half.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: A bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6 damage per caster level (max 10d6).

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Targets move and attack at double speed.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Target can fly at 120 feet per round with good maneuverability.

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: Negates magical effects. Chance based on caster level.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: Targets move and attack at half speed.

neutralize_poison.name: Neutralize Poison
neutralize_poison.description: Removes poison from creature or object. Can revive recently poisoned creature.

cure_disease.name: Cure Disease
cure_disease.description: Cures any disease afflicting the target.

prayer.name: Prayer
prayer.description: Allies gain +1 to attack, damage, and saves. Enemies get -1.

remove_curse.name: Remove Curse
remove_curse.description: Removes one curse from creature or object.

protection_from_evil_10_radius.name: Protection from Evil 10' Radius
protection_from_evil_10_radius.description: As Protection from Evil, but affects all within 10 feet of caster.

create_water.name: Create Water
create_water.description: Generates 4 gallons of clean water per level of the caster. **Reverse:** *Destroy Water* obliterates a like quantity of water.

purify_food_drink.name: Purify Food & Drink
purify_food_drink.description: Makes up to 1 cubic foot of spoiled/poisoned food or water safe to consume. **Reverse:** *Putrefy Food & Drink* spoils safe food/water.

remove_fear.name: Remove Fear
remove_fear.description: Instills courage, granting a +4 bonus to saving throws against magical fear for 1 turn. If affected by fear, grants another save with a +1/level bonus. **Reverse:** *Cause Fear* causes a victim to flee in panic.

resist_cold.name: Resist Cold
resist_cold.description: Creature touched is inured to cold, receiving a +3 bonus to saving throws and taking half (or quarter on successful save) damage from greater cold attacks (e.g., *ice storm*, dragon breath).

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Opponents must make a saving throw vs. magic to strike or attack the protected cleric. Cleric cannot take offensive action while protected.

augury.name: Augury
augury.description: Seeks to divine whether a future action (within 3 turns) will be beneficial or harmful. Base chance of 70% success + 1%/level.

chant.name: Chant
chant.description: Gives a +1 bonus to attack rolls, damage, and saving throws for friendly creatures within a 3" radius for as long as the cleric chants. Enemy rolls are penalized by -1.

detect_charm.name: Detect Charm
detect_charm.description: Detects if a creature is under the influence of a *charm* spell (up to 10 creatures). **Reverse:** *Obscure Charm* protects a single creature from such detection.

know_alignment.name: Know Alignment
know_alignment.description: Reveals the exact alignment of up to 10 persons. **Reverse:** *Obscure Alignment* totally obscures the alignment of a single person for 1 turn.

resist_fire.name: Resist Fire
resist_fire.description: Creature touched is toughened to withstand heat, taking half (or quarter on successful save) damage from magical fires (e.g., *fireball*, dragon breath) and gaining a +3 bonus to saving throws vs. fire attacks.

slow_poison.name: Slow Poison
slow_poison.description: Greatly slows the effects of venom, temporarily saving a victim up to 10 turns previous to casting. Victim loses 1 HP per turn but never drops below 1 HP while the spell lasts.

snake_charm.name: Snake Charm
snake_charm.description: Causes one or more snakes to cease activity and sway hypnotically. Total hit points of snakes affected cannot exceed the cleric's level.

speak_with_animals.name: Speak With Animals
speak_with_animals.description: Enables the cleric to communicate with any warm or cold-blooded animal (not mindless). Lasts 2 rounds per level.

animate_dead.name: Animate Dead
animate_dead.description: Creates skeletons or zombies from dead human remains to obey the cleric's commands (1 monster/level).

continual_light.name: Continual Light
continual_light.description: Creates a bright, permanent light (daylight equivalent). **Reverse:** *Continual Darkness* creates a permanent, impenetrable darkness.

create_food_water.name: Create Food & Water
create_food_water.description: Creates 1 cubic foot of nourishing food and/or water per level, sustaining three human-sized creatures for a full day.

cure_blindness.name: Cure Blindness
cure_blindness.description: Permanently cures most forms of blindness by touch. **Reverse:** *Cause Blindness*.

feign_death.name: Feign Death
feign_death.description: Puts the touched creature into a cataleptic state, appearing dead.

glyph_of_warding.name: Glyph of Warding
glyph_of_warding.description: Inscribes a magical rune to guard an area (25 sq. ft. per level) which, when triggered, releases a stored effect (e.g., electrical damage, fire damage, paralyze).

locate_object.name: Locate Object
locate_object.description: Aids in locating a known or familiar object by direction. **Reverse:** *Obscure Object* hides an object from location spells.

speak_with_dead.name: Speak With Dead
speak_with_dead.description: Allows the cleric to ask several questions of a dead creature (body or remains must be present). Limits on questions and maximum time dead depend on cleric level.

word_of_recall.name: Word of Recall
word_of_recall.description: Instantly teleports the cleric back to his or her previously designated sanctuary, carrying additional weight (250 gp/level) in equipment, treasure, or persons.

animal_friendship.name: Animal Friendship
animal_friendship.description: Charms one animal (non-semi-intelligent) to be a trusted friend and ally of the druid (subject to save). Allows druid to teach it 3 "tricks"/INT point.

detect_snares_pits.name: Detect Snares & Pits
detect_snares_pits.description: Detects hidden snares and pits (simple traps only underground, all traps outdoors) in a 1" path up to 4" long.

entangle.name: Entangle
entangle.description: Causes plants (*grasses, weeds, trees*) in a 4" diameter area to wrap, twist, and entwine creatures, holding them fast or slowing movement by 50% (subject to save).

faerie_fire.name: Faerie Fire
faerie_fire.description: Outlines an object or creature with a pale glowing light, making it visible (even if invisible) and giving a +2 penalty to opponents' AC ("to hit" bonus).

invisibility_to_animals.name: Invisibility To Animals
invisibility_to_animals.description: Makes the recipient totally undetectable by normal animals (INT under 6).

locate_animals.name: Locate Animals
locate_animals.description: Determines the direction and distance of any desired type of animal within range.

pass_without_trace.name: Pass Without Trace
pass_without_trace.description: Recipient moves through any terrain without leaving footprint or scent, making tracking impossible.

predict_weather.name: Predict Weather
predict_weather.description: Gains 100% accurate knowledge of the weather trend (sky, temperature, precipitation) for 2 hours in advance per level of the caster in a 9 square mile area.

shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
shillelagh.description: Changes a normal oaken club into a magical +1 weapon, inflicting 2-8 HP (man-sized) or 2-5 HP (larger).

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.description: Improves the recipient creature's Armor Class by 1 point and grants a +1 bonus to saving throws versus all attack forms except magic.

charm_person_or_mammal.name: Charm Person Or Mammal
charm_person_or_mammal.description: Charms one person or mammal (not monster) to regard the druid as a trusted friend and ally (subject to save). Duration depends on the charmed creature's intelligence.

fire_trap.name: Fire Trap
fire_trap.description: Traps a closable object (e.g., door, chest) to explode with fire damage (1-4 HP, half with save) when opened/touched by an unauthorized creature.

heat_metal.name: Heat Metal
heat_metal.description: Causes ferrous metal (iron, steel) in a mass of 500 gp/level to become searing hot over 7 rounds, causing damage and disability to exposed flesh. **Reverse:** *Chill Metal* causes metal to become freezing, causing damage and amputation.

obscurement.name: Obscurement
obscurement.description: Causes a misty vapor to arise around the druid, reducing visibility to 2' to 8' (2d4) for 4 rounds per level.

produce_flame.name: Produce Flame
produce_flame.description: Creates a bright, hot flame in the druid's palm. Lasts 2 rounds/level. Can be hurled as a missile (range 4"), igniting combustibles.

trip.name: Trip
trip.description: Causes a stick, vine, or rope object to rise and trip creatures crossing it (subject to save). Creatures running take damage and are stunned.

warp_wood.name: Warp Wood
warp_wood.description: Permanently bends and warps wood in a 1" range/level, destroying its straightness, form, and strength.

call_lightning.name: Call Lightning
call_lightning.description: Calls down bolts of lightning from the sky (must be a storm) that inflict 2d8+1d8/level HP damage (half with save) to creatures within a 1" radius of the strike.

hold_animal.name: Hold Animal
hold_animal.description: Holds 1-4 animals rigid (mammals, birds, or reptiles, not monsters) for 2 rounds/level. Saving throw is penalized based on the number of targets.

plant_growth.name: Plant Growth
plant_growth.description: Causes normal vegetation (brush, trees, vines) in a 2" X 2" square area/level to become a dense barrier.

protection_from_fire.name: Protection From Fire
protection_from_fire.description: Grants invulnerability to normal fires and 50% damage reduction (+4 save bonus) against magical fires for 1 turn/level.

pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
pyrotechnics.description: Causes a fire source to produce either a flashing burst of fireworks (blinding creatures) or a thick stream of smoke (obscuring vision).

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Creates a 90% undetectable snare from a flexible object (vine, rope) that contracts to bind or strangle a creature (1-6 HP damage) when triggered.

stone_shape.name: Stone Shape
stone_shape.description: Permanently forms an existing piece of stone (3 cubic feet/level) into a desired shape (e.g., weapon, trapdoor, idol).

summon_insects.name: Summon Insects
summon_insects.description: Attracts a cloud of flying or crawling insects (70% chance of flying) that swarm and attack a target, dealing 2 HP damage/round, and forcing the victim to fend them off.

tree.name: Tree
tree.description: Allows the druid to assume the form of a small living tree or shrub, or a large dead tree trunk, and observe their surroundings while in the form.

water_breathing.name: Water Breathing
water_breathing.description: Allows the recipient to freely breathe underwater for 6 turns/level. **Reverse:** *Air Breathing* allows water-breathing creatures to survive in the atmosphere.

affect_normal_fires.name: Affect Normal Fires
affect_normal_fires.description: Causes small fires (up to 3' diameter) to reduce in size/light (half consumption) or increase in size/light (double consumption). Heat output is unchanged.

comprehend_languages.name: Comprehend Languages
comprehend_languages.description: Allows the caster to read any incomprehensible written message (not magical writing) or understand the language of a speaking creature by touch.

dancing_lights.name: Dancing Lights
dancing_lights.description: Creates 1-4 lights resembling torches, spheres, or a vague man-like shape, that move as the caster desires.

enlarge.name: Enlarge
enlarge.description: Increases a living creature (up to 200% max) or object (up to 100% max) size and weight by 20% per level. **Reverse:** *Reduce* decreases size.

erase.name: Erase
erase.description: Removes writings (magical or mundane) from a scroll or two facing pages (50% base chance + 2%/level for magical, +4%/level for mundane).

feather_fall.name: Feather Fall
feather_fall.description: Instantly changes the rate of fall for creature(s)/objects to 2' per second (12' per segment), preventing damage on landing.

find_familiar.name: Find Familiar
find_familiar.description: Summons an abnormally intelligent animal familiar (e.g., cat, hawk, owl) to aid the magic-user.

friends.name: Friends
friends.description: Causes the magic-user to gain a temporary increase of 2-8 points in Charisma, or a temporary lowering of 1-4 points (subject to save by creatures in the area).

hold_portal.name: Hold Portal
hold_portal.description: Magically bars a door, gate, or valve for 1 round/level. Cannot be used on *wizard locked* doors.

identify.name: Identify
identify.description: Reveals 1 property of a touched magical item (requires pearl/owl feather component, and Constitution check upon use).

jump.name: Jump
jump.description: Empowers the recipient to leap up to 30' forward, 10' backward, or straight upward.

mending.name: Mending
mending.description: Repairs small breaks in non-magical objects (broken ring, hole in leather sack, etc.).

message.name: Message
message.description: Whispers a message to a pointed creature that can reply in a straight line.

nystul_s_magic_aura.name: Nystul's Magic Aura
nystul_s_magic_aura.description: Gives one item a false magical aura to fool *detect magic*.

push.name: Push
push.description: Causes an invisible force (1 foot-pound/level) to strike an object, moving small objects or causing a creature to lose its balance.

shocking_grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
shocking_grasp.description: Develops a powerful electrical charge in the caster's hand, inflicting 1-8 HP damage + 1 HP/level to the creature touched.

spider_climb.name: Spider Climb
spider_climb.description: Enables the recipient to climb and travel on vertical surfaces or ceilings at 3" movement rate.

tenser_s_floating_disc.name: Tenser's Floating Disc
tenser_s_floating_disc.description: Creates a 3' diameter, circular plane of null-gravity that holds 1,000 gp weight/level and follows the caster.

ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
ventriloquism.description: Makes the caster's voice (or similar sound) appear to issue from someplace else (another creature, statue, behind a door).

darkness_15_radius.name: Darkness, 15' Radius
darkness_15_radius.description: Creates a total, impenetrable darkness in a 15' radius sphere.

detect_invisibility.name: Detect Invisibility
detect_invisibility.description: Clearly sees any objects or creatures that are invisible (or astral, ethereal, hidden, or out of phase).

esp.name: ESP
esp.description: Detects the surface thoughts of any creature in range (except undead and those with no mind). Range and number of probes increase with level.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Temporarily changes copper coins to gold pieces, or brass items to solid gold. Chance of cold-wrought iron dispelling the dweomer (25-30% base chance).

forget.name: Forget
forget.description: Causes 1-4 individual creatures within a 2" X 2" area to forget the events of the previous round.

leomund_s_trap.name: Leomund's Trap
leomund_s_trap.description: Places a false trap illusion upon a small mechanism (lock, hinge) designed to fool dwarves and thieves (80% likely to be seen).

magic_mouth.name: Magic Mouth
magic_mouth.description: Empowers an object (not living/intelligent) with an enchanted mouth that speaks a 25-word message when a specified event occurs.

misdirection.name: Misdirection
misdirection.description: Misdirects the information from a detection-type spell (e.g., *detect magic, detect evil*) about a specific creature or item.

phantasmal_force.name: Phantasmal Force
phantasmal_force.description: Creates a visual illusion of an object, creature, or force (4 square" + 1 square"/level). Creatures believe it and can suffer damage until they successfully disbelieve.

ray_of_enfeeblement.name: Ray Of Enfeeblement
ray_of_enfeeblement.description: Weakens an opponent, reducing Strength by 25% + 2%/level (subject to save).

rope_trick.name: Rope Trick
rope_trick.description: Causes one end of a 5'-30' rope to rise into the air and anchor in an extra-dimensional space, allowing the caster and up to five others to climb to safety.

scare.name: Scare
scare.description: Causes a creature with < 6+1 HD/levels to fall into a fit of trembling and shaking (subject to save).

shatter.name: Shatter
shatter.description: Shivers non-magical objects of crystal, glass, ceramic, or porcelain (up to 100 gp/level) into dozens of pieces.

stinking_cloud.name: Stinking Cloud
stinking_cloud.description: Creates a billowing cloud of nauseous vapors (2" X 2" X 2" cloud) that causes creatures to be helpless due to nausea (or half helpless on successful save).

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: Increases a creature's Strength ability score (1-6 points or 1-8 tenths of 18) for 6 turns/level.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Causes the caster's material form to "blink" out and back to the plane in a random period/direction each round. Caster is only 75% likely to perform other actions during this spell.

clairaudience.name: Clairaudience
clairaudience.description: Allows the caster to concentrate on a known locale and hear in their mind whatever noise is within a 6" radius of that locale center.

clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.description: Allows the caster to see in their mind whatever is within sight range (normal or infrared/ultraviolet) of a known locale.

explosive_runes.name: Explosive Runes
explosive_runes.description: Traces mystic runes on a book/map/scroll that prevent unauthorized reading. When read, the runes detonate, dealing 12-30 (6d4+6) HP damage (no save).

flame_arrow.name: Flame Arrow
flame_arrow.description: Touches one arrow or crossbow bolt (quarrel) per segment, making it magical and causing +1 HP additional fire damage on a successful hit.

gust_of_wind.name: Gust Of Wind
gust_of_wind.description: Creates a strong puff of air (1" wide path, 1"/level long) that extinguishes small flames, fans large fires, forces back small flying creatures, and slows large flying creatures by 50%.

infravision.name: Infravision
infravision.description: Enables the recipient to see in the infrared spectrum up to 60' (lasts 12 turns + 6 turns/level).

invisibility_10_radius.name: Invisibility, 10' Radius
invisibility_10_radius.description: Makes the creature touched and all its gear within a 10' radius invisible.

leomund_s_tiny_hut.name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
leomund_s_tiny_hut.description: Creates an opaque sphere of force (10' diameter, half above/half below ground) that maintains 70°F inside temperature and withstands up to 50 mph winds.

monster_summoning_i.name: Monster Summoning I
monster_summoning_i.description: Summons 1-4 first level monsters to attack the caster's opponents (lasts 2 rounds + 1 round/level).

protection_from_normal_missiles.name: Protection From Normal Missiles
protection_from_normal_missiles.description: Bestows total invulnerability to hurled and projected missiles (arrows, axes, darts, etc.) and reduces damage from large/magical missiles.

suggestion.name: Suggestion
suggestion.description: Influences the actions of one creature by uttering a few words suggesting a reasonable course of action (lasts 6 turns + 6 turns/level).

tongues.name: Tongues
tongues.description: Enables the caster to speak the language of any creature (same as Cleric 4th Level).

audible_glamer.name: Audible Glamer
audible_glamer.description: Creates a volume of sound (talking, singing, roaring, etc.) at whatever range the caster desires (up to a dragon's roar).

change_self.name: Change Self
change_self.description: Alters the appearance of the illusionist's form, including clothing and equipment, to any generally man-shaped bipedal creature.

color_spray.name: Color Spray
color_spray.description: Causes a vivid, fan-shaped spray of colors that affects 1-6 creatures, potentially rendering them unconscious, blinded, or stunned, based on their HD/level.

gaze_reflection.name: Gaze Reflection
gaze_reflection.description: Creates a mirror-like area of air that reflects back any gaze attack (e.g., basilisk, medusa) upon the gazer.

wall_of_fog.name: Wall Of Fog
wall_of_fog.description: Creates a wall of misty vapors that obscures all sight (normal or infravision) beyond 2'.

blindness.name: Blindness
blindness.description: Causes the recipient creature to become totally blind (no cure except *dispel magic* or caster's will).

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Causes the outline of the illusionist's form to become blurred, shifting, and wavery, penalizing missile and melee attacks against them.

hypnotic_pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
hypnotic_pattern.description: Creates a weaving, turning pattern of subtle colors that causes creatures looking at it to become fascinated and entranced (up to 24 HD/levels total).

improved_phantasmal_force.name: Improved Phantasmal Force
improved_phantasmal_force.description: A phantasmal force illusion that can be maintained with minimal concentration (lasts 2 rounds after concentration ceases).

dispel_illusion.name: Dispel Illusion
dispel_illusion.description: Dispels any *phantasmal force* (with or without audible glamer) cast by a non-illusionist, and has a chance to dispel other illusionist spells.

illusionary_script.name: Illusionary Script
illusionary_script.description: Creates illusionary script on paper/parchment that can only be read by the person(s) the illusionist desires (others become confused).

paralyzation.name: Paralyzation
paralyzation.description: Creates illusionary muscle slowdown that paralyzes creatures whose total HD do not exceed twice the illusionist's level.

spectral_force.name: Spectral Force
spectral_force.description: Creates an illusion that includes sound, smell, and thermal illusions.

detect_lie.name: Detect Lie
detect_lie.description: Enables the recipient to determine if truth is being spoken (lasts 1 round/level). Reverse: *Undetectable Lie* makes a lie seem reasonable.

divination.name: Divination
divination.description: Gives information regarding an area (small woods, building, dungeon level). Success chance 60% + 1%/level, adjusted by DM for area specifics.

exorcise.name: Exorcise
exorcise.description: Negates possession of a creature or object by an outside/supernatural force (e.g., demon, curse, charm, *magic jar*). Base 1-100% chance of success, checked each turn.

lower_water.name: Lower Water
lower_water.description: Causes water or similar fluid in a 1" x 1" square/level area to sink away (5% of original effect/level). Reverse: *Raise Water* causes water to return to its normal highest level + 1 foot/level.

speak_with_plants.name: Speak With Plants
speak_with_plants.description: Enables the cleric to converse with any living vegetable, allowing questions about creatures, making thickets part, etc. (lasts 1 round/level).

sticks_to_snakes.name: Sticks to Snakes
sticks_to_snakes.description: Changes 1 stick/level into a snake (5% chance/level of being venomous) that attacks as commanded. Reverse: *Snakes to Sticks* changes snakes to sticks.

atonement.name: Atonement
atonement.description: Removes the onus of unwilling or unknown deeds, or magical alignment change. Requires true repentance.

commune.name: Commune
commune.description: Contacts the cleric's divinity (or agents) to request information in the form of questions answered by a simple "yes" or "no" (1 question/level).

cure_critical_wounds.name: Cure Critical Wounds
cure_critical_wounds.description: Heals 6-27 (3d8+3) HP damage. Reverse: *Cause Critical Wounds* inflicts 6-27 HP damage (requires touch attack).

dispel_evil.name: Dispel Evil
dispel_evil.description: Causes summoned/enchanted evil creatures to return to their own plane or place. Affected creatures attack the caster at -7 penalty. Reverse: *Dispel Good* against summoned/enchanted good creatures.

flame_strike.name: Flame Strike
flame_strike.description: Calls down a column of fire, inflicting 6-48 (6d8) HP damage (half if saving throw is successful).

insect_plague.name: Insect Plague
insect_plague.description: Horde of insects swarms in a 36" diameter, 6" high cloud, dealing 1 HP damage/round to creatures within, and forcing morale checks.

plane_shift.name: Plane Shift
plane_shift.description: Moves the cleric (and up to 6 others linked in a circle) to another plane of existence. The specific destination depends on a small, forked metal rod component.

quest.name: Quest
quest.description: Requires an affected creature to perform a service and return with proof. Failure results in -1 penalty to saving throws daily.

raise_dead.name: Raise Dead
raise_dead.description: Restores life to a dwarf, gnome, half-elf, halfling, or human dead up to 1 day per level of the cleric (subject to Constitution survival save). Reverse: *Slay Living* (inflicts *cause serious wounds* damage on a successful touch attack).

true_seeing.name: True Seeing
true_seeing.description: Allows the cleric to see things as they actually are in a 12" sight range, revealing secret doors, invisible things, illusions, and creature auras. Reverse: *False Seeing* causes a person to see things as they are not.

aerial_servant.name: Aerial Servant
aerial_servant.description: Summons an invisible stalker to perform the cleric's bidding for a maximum of 1 day/level, primarily for finding and returning objects.

animate_object.name: Animate Object
animate_object.description: Imbues inanimate objects (1 cubic foot/level) with mobility and a semblance of life to attack as commanded.

blade_barrier.name: Blade Barrier
blade_barrier.description: Creates a wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades that inflicts 8-64 (8d8) HP damage to creatures passing through. Lasts 3 rounds/level.

conjure_animals.name: Conjure Animals
conjure_animals.description: Summons one or more mammals with total HD up to the cleric's level to attack opponents. Lasts 2 rounds/level.

find_the_path.name: Find The Path
find_the_path.description: Enables the cleric to find the shortest, most direct route to a known destination (outdoors, underground, trap, or *maze* spell). Reverse: *Lose the Path* makes the creature touched totally lost.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Completely cures any disease/blindness, and heals all wound/injury damage suffered (1-4 HP remaining damage). Reverse: *Harm* infects the victim with a disease and causes loss of all hit points (1-4 remaining damage).

part_water.name: Part Water
part_water.description: Causes water or similar liquid to move apart, forming a trough 3' deep by 1' wide by 2" long/level.

speak_with_monsters.name: Speak With Monsters
speak_with_monsters.description: Allows the cleric to converse with any type of creature with communicative ability (lasts 1 melee round/level).

stone_tell.name: Stone Tell
stone_tell.description: The very stones of an area (1 cubic yard of stone) speak and relate what has touched them, what is concealed, and what has transpired.

astral_spell.name: Astral Spell
astral_spell.description: Projects the cleric's astral body into the Astral Plane, leaving the physical body behind in suspended animation. Allows travel to other planes.

control_weather.name: Control Weather
control_weather.description: Allows the cleric to change the weather in an area of 4-16 square miles (takes 1 turn to cast, 1-4 turns for effect).

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Creates a local tremor in a circular area (1/2" diameter/level), causing cliffs/caves to collapse, ground to crack, and structures to sustain damage/fall.

gate.name: Gate
gate.description: Opens an ultra-dimensional connection to a specific powerful being (demon, devil, demi-god, god, etc.), causing it to step through the portal or be attracted.

holy_(unholy)_word.name: Holy (Unholy) Word
holy_(unholy)_word.description: Utterance has tremendous power, driving off evil (or good for *Unholy Word*) creatures from other planes, and affecting other creatures of differing alignment (killing, paralyzing, stunning, deafening) based on their HD/level.

regenerate.name: Regenerate
regenerate.description: Causes body members, bones, or organs to grow back. Reverse: *Wither* causes a member or organ to shrivel and cease functioning.

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.description: Raises the life energy level of the recipient creature by one, subsuming previous life energy level drain. Reverse: *Energy Drain* draws away one life energy level (requires touch attack).

resurrection.name: Resurrection
resurrection.description: Restores life and complete strength to a dead person (subject to Constitution survival save) dead up to 10 years/level. Reverse: *Destruction* causes the victim to be instantly dead and turned to dust.

symbol.name: Symbol
symbol.description: Inscribes magical runes that, when triggered, affect creatures passing over/touching/reading/passing through the portal with a chosen effect (Death, Discord, Fear, Hopelessness).

wind_walk.name: Wind Walk
wind_walk.description: Alters the cleric's body (and up to two others touched) to cloud-like vapors, allowing travel at up to 60" per turn (not invisible, but appear misty). ***

animal_summoning_i.name: Animal Summoning I
animal_summoning_i.description: Calls up to eight animals (max 4 HD each) of whatever sort the druid names (if within range) to aid the druid.

call_woodland_beings.name: Call Woodland Beings
call_woodland_beings.description: Summons certain woodland creatures (brownies, centaurs, dryads, pixies, satyrs, sprites, treants, unicorns) to the druid's locale to aid them (subject to save).

control_temperature_10_radius.name: Control Temperature, 10' Radius
control_temperature_10_radius.description: Alters the temperature surrounding the druid by 9 degrees Fahrenheit per level (up or down).

hallucinatory_forest.name: Hallucinatory Forest
hallucinatory_forest.description: Creates the illusion of a perfectly natural forest in a 4" square/level area. Reverse: *Hallucinatory Clearing*.

hold_plant.name: Hold Plant
hold_plant.description: Affects vegetable matter (e.g., green slime, treants) to cease moving, entwining, or making sound.

plant_door.name: Plant Door
plant_door.description: Opens a magical portal through trees or other growth for the druid (and higher level druids/dryads) to enter and move from inside to another tree of the same species.

produce_fire.name: Produce Fire
produce_fire.description: Causes a common-type fire (up to 12" square) to ignite combustibles and cause 1-4 HP damage in a single round. Reverse: *Quench Fire* extinguishes a normal fire.

protection_from_lightning.name: Protection From Lightning
protection_from_lightning.description: Grants invulnerability to normal electrical attacks and 50% damage reduction (+4 save bonus) against magical lightning/electrical attacks for 1 turn/level.

repel_insects.name: Repel Insects
repel_insects.description: Creates an invisible barrier up to 10' radius that prevents normal insects from approaching.

animal_growth.name: Animal Growth
animal_growth.description: Causes animals (max 8) in a 2" square area to grow to twice their normal size, doubling hit dice and damage in combat. Reverse: *Animal Shrinkage* reduces size by half.

animal_summoning_ii.name: Animal Summoning II
animal_summoning_ii.description: Calls up to six animals (max 8 HD each) or 12 animals (max 4 HD each).

anti_plant_shell.name: Anti-Plant Shell
anti_plant_shell.description: Creates an invisible hemispherical force field (20' diameter) that prevents the entrance of any animal matter of normal (not magical) nature.

commune_with_nature.name: Commune With Nature
commune_with_nature.description: Enables the druid to become one with nature in a 1/2 mile radius/level, gaining knowledge of one fact about the surrounding territory (ground, plants, water, people).

control_winds.name: Control Winds
control_winds.description: Alters wind force in a 4"/level radius hemisphere, increasing/decreasing force by 3 mph/level (e.g., winds of 75+ mph cause devastation).

moonbeam.name: Moonbeam
moonbeam.description: Summons a 1" diameter, 1" long/level column of pale, cold light that inflicts 2-12 (2d6) HP damage (half with save) to creatures within and has an effect similar to *Dispel Magic* on enchanted creatures.

pass_plant.name: Pass Plant
pass_plant.description: Allows the druid to enter a tree and move from inside it to another living tree of the same species within range.

spike_stones.name: Spike Stones
spike_stones.description: Permanently creates an area of jagged spikes (1" square area/level) that inflicts 2-12 (2d6) HP damage to creatures moving 1" or more per round.

transmute_rock_to_mud.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
transmute_rock_to_mud.description: Turns natural rock (2 cubic "/level) into an equal volume of mud. Reverse: *Mud to Rock* hardens normal mud into soft stone.

wall_of_fire.name: Wall of Fire
wall_of_fire.description: Creates a blazing curtain of magical fire (up to 2" square/level) that inflicts 4-16 HP damage (or 2-8 HP near the wall) to creatures passing through.

animal_summoning_iii.name: Animal Summoning III
animal_summoning_iii.description: Calls up to four animals (max 16 HD each), eight animals (max 8 HD each), or 16 creatures (max 4 HD each).

anti_animal_shell.name: Anti-Animal Shell
anti_animal_shell.description: Creates an invisible hemispherical force field (20' diameter) that prevents the entrance of any animal matter of normal (not magical) nature.

conjure_fire_elemental.name: Conjure Fire Elemental
conjure_fire_elemental.description: Summons a strong (16 HD) fire elemental to aid the druid. Reverse: *Dismiss Fire Elemental*.

feeblemind.name: Feeblemind
feeblemind.description: Causes a victim's brain to become that of a moronic child, remaining in this state until *heal*, *restoration*, or *wish* is used.

fire_seeds.name: Fire Seeds
fire_seeds.description: Creates up to four acorn missiles (2-16 HP on impact) or eight holly berry timed incendiaries (1-8 HP burst damage on command) that ignite combustibles.

liveoak.name: Liveoak
liveoak.description: Permanently animates an acorn into a Small, mobile tree to serve as a guard or servitor.

transport_via_plants.name: Transport Via Plants
transport_via_plants.description: Allows the druid to enter any large living plant and pass any distance to a living plant of the same species in a single round.

turn_wood.name: Turn Wood
turn_wood.description: Pushes away all wooden objects in a 12" wide path, 2" long/level, splinters fixed objects, and drags objects (and carriers) back.

wall_of_thorns.name: Wall Of Thorns
wall_of_thorns.description: Creates a barrier of very tough, pliable green tangled brush (10" cube/level) that inflicts 8 HP damage + AC to creatures breaking through.

weather_summoning.name: Weather Summoning
weather_summoning.description: Calls forth weather commensurate with the climate and season (e.g., tornado, heat wave, blizzard). Not under the druid's control.

animate_rock.name: Animate Rock
animate_rock.description: Causes a single lithic object (2 cubic feet of stone/level) to move and attack as commanded.

chariot_of_sustarre.name: Chariot Of Sustarre
chariot_of_sustarre.description: Summons a large flaming chariot pulled by two fiery horses for transport (24" on ground, 48" flying). Creatures within 5' take *wall of fire* damage.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: Causes 2-8 creatures within a 4" X 4" area to become confused (act randomly, 10% wander away, 50% confused, 20% attack nearest, 20% attack druid/party).

conjure_earth_elemental.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
conjure_earth_elemental.description: Summons a strong (16 HD) earth elemental to aid the druid. Reverse: *Dismiss Earth Elemental*.

creeping_doom.name: Creeping Doom
creeping_doom.description: Calls forth a mass of venomous, biting, and stinging arachnids, insects, and myriapods (500-1000 in number) that swarm and attack.

finger_of_death.name: Finger Of Death
finger_of_death.description: Causes the victim's heart to stop, slaying the creature if it fails its saving throw.

fire_storm.name: Fire Storm
fire_storm.description: Creates a whole area (2" cube/level) shot through with sheets of roaring flame, inflicting 2-16 HP damage + 1 HP/level (half with save). Reverse: *Fire Quench* smothers a fire.

reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
reincarnate.description: Brings back a dead person (dead up to 1 week) in a new, random body and race (subject to *Magic-User Reincarnation Table*).

transmute_metal_to_wood.name: Transmute Metal To Wood
transmute_metal_to_wood.description: Changes one metal object (max 80 gp weight/level) into wood. Magical objects are 10% likely to be affected. ***

charm_monster.name: Charm Monster
charm_monster.description: Charms any living creature (or several of lesser level) to regard the caster as friendly (same as 1st level, but more powerful).

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: Excavates 125 cubic feet of earth/sand/mud per round (5' cube).

dimension_door.name: Dimension Door
dimension_door.description: Instantly transfers the caster and additional weight (up to 5,000 gp) to a well-known destination within range (no error).

enchanted_weapon.name: Enchanted Weapon
enchanted_weapon.description: Turns an ordinary weapon (two small or one large) into a magical weapon (no bonuses, but hits any opponent) for 5 rounds/level.

extension_i.name: Extension I
extension_i.description: Prolongs the duration of a previously cast 1st, 2nd, or 3rd level spell by 50%.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Sends forth an invisible ray that causes creatures (HD 1 to 12) within its area to turn and flee in panic (base 60% chance, reduced 5%/level).

fire_charm.name: Fire Charm
fire_charm.description: Causes a normal fire source to serve as a magical agent, with a gossamer veil of flame circling it, charming creatures observing it to remain motionless (subject to save).

fire_shield.name: Fire Shield
fire_shield.description: Immolates the caster (but no damage taken) with flames, protecting against cold-based attacks (half damage, +2 save bonus) and dealing double damage to body/hand-held weapon attackers.

fumble.name: Fumble
fumble.description: Causes the recipient creature to suddenly become clumsy and awkward, potentially dropping held objects or weapons.

hallucinatory_terrain.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
hallucinatory_terrain.description: Creates an illusion which hides the actual terrain (e.g., field looks like a swamp) in an area 1" X 1" square/level.

ice_storm.name: Ice Storm
ice_storm.description: Causes either great hail stones (3-30 HP damage) or driving sleet (blinding creatures and slowing movement by 50%) to fall in the area of effect.

massmorph.name: Massmorph
massmorph.description: Causes willing creatures (man-size or smaller, up to 10/level) to appear as normal trees of any sort.

minor_globe_of_invulnerability.name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
minor_globe_of_invulnerability.description: Creates a magical sphere around the caster which prevents any 1st, 2nd, or 3rd level spells from penetrating.

polymorph_other.name: Polymorph Other
polymorph_other.description: Completely alters the form, ability, personality, and mentality of one creature (subject to Constitution system shock save).

polymorph_self.name: Polymorph Self
polymorph_self.description: Allows the caster to assume the form of any creature (wren to hippopotomus) and its form of locomotion, but without gaining new abilities (2 turns/level).

rarys_mnemonic_enhancer.name: Rary's Mnemonic Enhancer
rarys_mnemonic_enhancer.description: Allows the magic-user to memorize (or retain the memory of) three additional spell levels (e.g., three 1st level spells, or one 3rd level spell).

wall_of_ice.name: Wall Of Ice
wall_of_ice.description: Creates a sheet of strong, flexible ice (1" thick/level, 1" square area/level) that stops pursuers and deals 2 HP damage/inch of thickness to creatures breaking through.

wizard_eye.name: Wizard Eye
wizard_eye.description: Creates an invisible sensory organ that sends visual information to the caster and travels at 3" per round.

airy_water.name: Airy Water
airy_water.description: Turns normal liquid to a less dense, breathable substance in a 2" diameter sphere/4" diameter hemisphere, allowing movement and breathing underwater.

bigbys_interposing_hand.name: Bigby's Interposing Hand
bigbys_interposing_hand.description: Creates a large, disembodied hand of force that interposes itself between the caster and opponent, taking damage as the caster.

chaos.name: Chaos
chaos.description: Causes all creatures in a 4" X 4" area to become confused (same as 4th level, but affects all creatures).

cloudkill.name: Cloudkill
cloudkill.description: Generates a billowing cloud of yellowish-green vapors (4" wide, 2" high, 2" deep) that slays creatures with < 4+1 HD/levels, and causes those up to 6 HD/levels to save vs. poison or be slain.

cone_of_cold.name: Cone Of Cold
cone_of_cold.description: Causes a cone-shaped area of extreme cold (1/2" long/level) to erupt from the caster's hand, inflicting 1d4+1 HP damage/level (half if saving throw is successful).

conjure_elemental.name: Conjure Elemental
conjure_elemental.description: Summons a 16 HD Air, Earth, Fire, or Water Elemental to do the caster's bidding (requires concentration, 5% chance of turning on caster).

contact_other_plane.name: Contact Other Plane
contact_other_plane.description: Sends the caster's mind to another plane of existence to request information (answered with "yes/no/maybe/never"). Risk of insanity or death increases with distance.

distance_distortion.name: Distance Distortion
distance_distortion.description: Causes an earth elemental to distort an area's dimensions (100 sq. "/level) to effectively appear half or twice the distance to those traveling over it.

hold_monster.name: Hold Monster
hold_monster.description: Immobilizes 1-4 creatures of any type (monsters/humans) in sight and range for 1 round/level.

leomunds_secret_chest.name: Leomund's Secret Chest
leomunds_secret_chest.description: Instantly transfers a specially crafted chest and its contents (1 cubic foot/level) to the ethereal plane, retrievable by a tiny replica.

magic_jar.name: Magic Jar
magic_jar.description: Transfers the caster's life force to a special container (gem/crystal), from which it can possess the mind and body of a victim (subject to save).

mordenkainens_faithful_hound.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
mordenkainens_faithful_hound.description: Summons a phantom watchdog that only the caster can see. It guards an area and attacks creatures approaching it from behind with a vicious 3-18 HP bite.

passwall.name: Passwall
passwall.description: Opens a passage (5' wide, 8' high, 10' deep) through wooden, plaster, or stone walls. Lasts 6 turns + 1 turn/level.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description: Mentally moves objects or opponents (up to 250 gp weight/level) by will force, with movement increasing each round.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Instantly transports the caster and additional weight to a well-known destination (distance is not a factor). Risk of error increases with unfamiliarity.

wall_of_force.name: Wall Of Force
wall_of_force.description: Creates an invisible barrier (20' square/level) that is totally impervious to all magic, spells, blows, and missiles (destroyed only by *disintegrate*).

wall_of_iron.name: Wall Of Iron
wall_of_iron.description: Creates a vertical iron wall (1/4" thick/level, 15 sq. ft./level) that inserts itself into surrounding material. Permanent unless dispelled or destroyed by force.

wall_of_stone.name: Wall Of Stone
wall_of_stone.description: Creates a wall of granite rock (1/4" thick, 20' square/level) that merges into adjoining rock surfaces. Permanent unless destroyed by *disintegrate* or force.

anti_magic_shell.name: Anti-Magic Shell
anti_magic_shell.description: Creates an invisible barrier (1'/level diameter sphere) that surrounds the caster and moves with them, totally impervious to all magic and spell effects (1st-5th level spells).

bigbys_forceful_hand.name: Bigby's Forceful Hand
bigbys_forceful_hand.description: Creates a large, disembodied hand of force that pushes creatures (up to 500 lbs) away or slows movement of larger creatures.

death_spell.name: Death Spell
death_spell.description: Instantly and irrevocably slays creatures with less than 2 HD, or 4-80 (4d20) HD of creatures with 2-8 HD in a 1/2" square/level area.

disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
disintegrate.description: Causes matter (living or non-living, up to 1" cubic volume) to vanish permanently (subject to save).

enchant_an_item.name: Enchant An Item
enchant_an_item.description: Prepares a non-magical item (must be finest quality) to accept a magical dweomer. Casting time is 16 hours + 8d8 hours.

extension_iii.name: Extension III
extension_iii.description: Prolongs the duration of a previously cast 1st-3rd level spell to double duration, and 4th or 5th level spell by 50%.

geas.name: Geas
geas.description: Places a magical command upon a creature to carry out some service or refrain from some action. Failure results in sickness and eventual death (1-4 weeks).

glassee.name: Glassee
glassee.description: Makes a section of metal, stone, or wood transparent to the caster's gaze (or creates a transparent area) for 1 round/level.

globe_of_invulnerability.name: Globe Of Invulnerability
globe_of_invulnerability.description: Creates a magical sphere around the caster which prevents any 1st through 4th level spells from penetrating.

guards_and_wards.name: Guards And Wards
guards_and_wards.description: Defends a stronghold with various permanent effects: misty corridors, *wizard locked* doors, illusory wall, web-filled stairs, minor confusion, and other chosen magics.

invisible_stalker.name: Invisible Stalker
invisible_stalker.description: Summons an 8 HD invisible stalker from the Elemental Plane of Air to obey the caster's commands.

legend_lore.name: Legend Lore
legend_lore.description: Determines information regarding a known person, place, or thing (casting time 1 turn up to 12 weeks, depending on information known).

move_earth.name: Move Earth
move_earth.description: Moves dirt (clay, loam, sand) and its components to collapse embankments, shift dunes, etc., over a 4" square area/turn of casting.

otilukes_freezing_sphere.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
otilukes_freezing_sphere.description: Creates a globe of matter at absolute zero temperature that, on contact with water, freezes a 6" deep layer of ice over 100 sq. ft./level, or can be cast as a thin ray (4 HP/level damage).

project_image.name: Project Image
project_image.description: Creates a non-material duplicate of the caster up to 1"/level distant, which performs actions (walking, speaking, spell-casting) identical to the caster. Spells originate from the image.

reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
reincarnation.description: Same as Druid 7th Level (but with *Magic-User Reincarnation Table*).

repulsion.name: Repulsion
repulsion.description: Causes all creatures in a 1" path to move away from the caster at 3" per round.

spiritwrack.name: Spiritwrack
spiritwrack.description: Strong protection/punishment spell against powerful creatures of the nether planes (Demons, Devils) whose name the caster knows. Roots them to the spot and causes pain/damage unless they succeed in a series of saves.

stone_to_flesh.name: Stone To Flesh
stone_to_flesh.description: Turns any sort of stone (9 cubic feet/level) into flesh (restoring life if formerly living). Reverse: *Flesh to Stone* turns flesh of any sort to stone (subject to save).

tensers_transformation.name: Tenser's Transformation
tensers_transformation.description: Undergoes a startling transformation, doubling hit points and attack rate, improving AC by 4, and granting +2 damage on attacks (lasts 1 round/level).

bigbys_grasping_hand.name: Bigby's Grasping Hand
bigbys_grasping_hand.description: Creates a huge, disembodied hand of force that can hold motionless a creature or object of up to 1,000 lbs weight.

cacodemon.name: Cacodemon
cacodemon.description: Summons a powerful Demon of type IV, V, or VI (if name is known) to serve the caster (by threat of *spiritwrack* or promise of tribute/human sacrifices).

charm_plants.name: Charm Plants
charm_plants.description: Brings under command vegetable life forms in a 3" X 1" area/level (same as Druid 7th Level).

delayed_blast_fireball.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
delayed_blast_fireball.description: Same as *Fireball*, but +1 on each damage die, and can be commanded to release its blast up to 5 rounds after casting.

drawmijs_instant_summons.name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
drawmijs_instant_summons.description: Instantly teleports one small, non-living object (max 75 gp weight) to the caster's hand upon crushing a gem component.

duo_dimension.name: Duo-Dimension
duo_dimension.description: Causes the caster to have only two dimensions, making them invisible when turned sideways (3 rounds + 1 round/level).

limited_wish.name: Limited Wish
limited_wish.description: Fulfills literally, but only partially or for a limited duration, the utterance of the spell caster. Will not substantially change major realities.

mass_invisibility.name: Mass Invisibility
mass_invisibility.description: Makes up to 300-400 man-sized creatures invisible within a 3" X 3" area.

mordenkainens_sword.name: Mordenkainen's Sword
mordenkainens_sword.description: Brings into being a shimmering sword-like plane of force that strikes as a fighter of half the caster's level, dealing 5-20 HP damage.

phase_door.name: Phase Door
phase_door.description: Creates an invisible door/passage through a wall for the caster to enter and disappear (lasts 1 usage/2 levels).

power_word_stun.name: Power Word, Stun
power_word_stun.description: Stuns one creature with up to 90 HP for 1-8 rounds, with duration depending on the victim's current HP.

reverse_gravity.name: Reverse Gravity
reverse_gravity.description: Reverses gravity in a 1/2"/level range area, causing all unfixed objects and creatures to "fall" upwards.

simulacrum.name: Simulacrum
simulacrum.description: Creates a non-material duplicate of any creature, with 51-60% of the original's HP and some knowledge/personality (formed from snow/ice).

statue.name: Statue
statue.description: Turns the caster or another creature (and gear) into solid stone (subject to save), where they can still see/hear/smell.

teleport_without_error.name: Teleport Without Error
teleport_without_error.description: Instantly transports the caster and additional weight to a well-known destination without any risk of error.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Causes an object (up to 500 gp weight/level) to vanish by placing it into the ethereal plane, potentially replaced by stone.

antipathy/sympathy.name: Antipathy/Sympathy
antipathy/sympathy.description: Creates certain vibrations that either repel (*Antipathy*) or attract (*Sympathy*) a specific type of living, intelligent creature or character alignment in the area/item.

bigbys_clenched_fist.name: Bigby's Clenched Fist
bigbys_clenched_fist.description: Creates a huge, disembodied hand of force that strikes an opponent each round, with varying degrees of damage/stunning (1-6 HP up to 4-24 HP).

clone.name: Clone
clone.description: Creates a duplicate of a person, complete to the level of experience, which takes 2-8 months to grow. Dual existence of original and clone causes insanity/suicide.

glassteel.name: Glassteel
glassteel.description: Turns crystal or glass (max 10 lbs/level) into a transparent substance with the tensile strength and unbreakability of steel.

incendiary_cloud.name: Incendiary Cloud
incendiary_cloud.description: Creates a dense vapor cloud (10' high, 20' long/wide) that begins to flame on the 3rd round, dealing 1/2 HP damage/level to creatures inside.

mass_charm.name: Mass Charm
mass_charm.description: Charms a number of creatures (total HD not exceeding twice the caster's level) in a maximum 3" X 3" area.

maze.name: Maze
maze.description: Traps one creature in an extra-dimensional shifting labyrinth of force planes. The creature wanders for a period dependent on its intelligence.

mind_blank.name: Mind Blank
mind_blank.description: Totally protects the recipient from all spells and devices that detect, influence, or read emotions/thoughts (e.g., *charm, ESP, geas, wish*).

ottos_irresistible_dance.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
ottos_irresistible_dance.description: Causes the recipient creature to begin dancing uncontrollably, lowering their AC by -4, making saves impossible, and negating shield use.

permanency.name: Permanency
permanency.description: Makes the duration of certain other spells (e.g., *enlarge, invisibility, wall of force, wall of fire*) permanent, at the cost of 1 Constitution point to the caster.

polymorph_any_object.name: Polymorph Any Object
polymorph_any_object.description: Changes one object (living or otherwise) into another, with variable duration depending on the radical difference in kingdom, class, size, etc.

power_word_blind.name: Power Word, Blind
power_word_blind.description: Temporarily blinds one or more creatures (up to 100 HP total affected) for 2-5 rounds or turns, with duration based on current HP.

sertens_spell_immunity.name: Serten's Spell Immunity
sertens_spell_immunity.description: Confers virtual immunity and a large bonus (+5 to +9) to saving throws against certain spells (e.g., *charm, fear, hold, geas*).

trap_the_soul.name: Trap The Soul
trap_the_soul.description: Forces a creature's life force into a special prison gem (requires gem cost 1,000 gp/HD, plus a *maze* spell enchanted onto it).

bigbys_crushing_hand.name: Bigby's Crushing Hand
bigbys_crushing_hand.description: Creates a huge, disembodied hand of force that grasps and squeezes an opponent, dealing increasing damage over successive rounds.

imprisonment.name: Imprisonment
imprisonment.description: Entombes the recipient creature in a state of suspended animation in a small sphere far below the earth's surface. Reverse: *Freedom* causes the victim to reappear at the spot they were entombed.

meteor_swarm.name: Meteor Swarm
meteor_swarm.description: Launches four 2" diameter spheres or eight 1" diameter spheres that burst as *fireballs* (10-40 HP or 5-20 HP damage each) in a diamond or box pattern.

monster_summoning_vii.name: Monster Summoning VII
monster_summoning_vii.description: Summons 1 or 2 seventh level monsters or 1 eighth level monster.

power_word_kill.name: Power Word, Kill
power_word_kill.description: Instantly slays one or more creatures with up to 60 HP total.

prismatic_sphere.name: Prismatic Sphere
prismatic_sphere.description: Conjures an opaque globe of shimmering, multi-colored spheres that surrounds the caster. Each of the seven colors (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet) has a different power/protection against attacks and spells.

shape_change.name: Shape Change
shape_change.description: Allows the caster to assume the form of any creature (short of a demi-god, demon prince, etc.) and all its physical abilities, over and over (1 turn/level).

temporal_stasis.name: Temporal Stasis
temporal_stasis.description: Places the recipient creature into a state of suspended animation, where time stops for them (no aging/body functions). Reverse: *Temporal Reinstatement* removes the stasis.

time_stop.name: Time Stop
time_stop.description: Stops the flow of time in the area of effect, allowing the caster to move and act freely while other creatures are frozen (1/2 segment/level).

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: A more potent version of *Limited Wish*, which can fulfill the caster's utterance literally, but can still cause disaster if phrased poorly. ***

dispel_exhaustion.name: Dispel Exhaustion
dispel_exhaustion.description: Gives the illusion that a touched person is fresh and well, restoring 50% of lost HP.

emotion.name: Emotion
emotion.description: Projects a chosen emotion (Fear, Hate, Hopelessness, Rage) from the illusionist, affecting morale, attack rolls, damage, or saving throws.

phantasmal_killer.name: Phantasmal Killer
phantasmal_killer.description: Creates the illusion of the victim's most fearsome imagined thing. On a successful hit, the victim dies from fright.

demi_shadow_monsters.name: Demi-Shadow Monsters
demi_shadow_monsters.description: Creates quasi-real monsters (40% real) of armor class 8 with 40% of normal hit points and damage potential.

major_creation.name: Major Creation
major_creation.description: Creates mineral objects (same as *Minor Creation* for vegetable objects, but permanent).

shadow_magic.name: Shadow Magic
shadow_magic.description: Allows the caster to cast a quasi-real M-U spell (*magic missile, fireball, lightning bolt, or cone of cold*) that deals damage (or 1 HP/level if recognized).

demi_shadow_magic.name: Demi-Shadow Magic
demi_shadow_magic.description: Allows the caster to cast quasi-real M-U spells (*wall of fire, wall of ice, or cloudkill*) that deal more damage than *Shadow Magic*.

mass_suggestion.name: Mass Suggestion
mass_suggestion.description: Same as M-U 3rd Level, but affects one creature per level of the illusionist.

permanent_illusion.name: Permanent Illusion
permanent_illusion.description: Creates a lasting *spectral force* (same as *Phantasmal Force* but permanent and requires no concentration).

shades.name: Shades
shades.description: Creates quasi-real monsters (60% real) of armor class 6 with 60% of normal hit points and damage potential.

true_sight.name: True Sight
true_sight.description: Allows the illusionist to see its actual or former form, but does not allow determination of alignment.

veil.name: Veil
veil.description: Instantly changes the appearance of surroundings (up to 2" X 2"/level) to fool creatures, making a filthy den look like a sumptuous room.

alter_reality.name: Alter Reality
alter_reality.description: Similar to *Limited Wish*, allowing the illusionist to alter reality through the casting of a *phantasmal force* illusion.

prismatic_spray.name: Prismatic Spray
prismatic_spray.description: Causes 7 rays of the *prismatic sphere* spell (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet) to spring from the caster's hand, affecting creatures with a random effect (based on d8 roll).

prismatic_wall.name: Prismatic Wall
prismatic_wall.description: Creates a wall, or curtain, of scintillating colors with effects identical to the *prismatic sphere* globes, with maximum proportions 4' wide per level and 2' high per level.

vision.name: Vision
vision.description: Allows the illusionist to call upon a power for supernatural guidance, receiving a *vision* in answer to a question (chance of success based on dice roll, intelligence, and sacrifice).
